mapper.insert: INSERT INTO training (resume_id, training_name, institution, start_date, end_date, description) VALUES (#{resumeId}, #{trainingName}, #{institution}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description});
mapper.update: UPDATE training SET training_name = #{trainingName}, institution = #{institution}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, description = #{description} WHERE training_id = #{trainingId};
